name: ShittyBird
description:
Control the bird by flapping your hands over the leap motion device. High enough, the bird can't hold it anymore and drops in regular intervals. Can you hit the pot of the poor dude walking of his coffee break?

Don't get to high expectations from the great game name. This prototype was build in only a couple of hours at the monthly Berlin mini game jam and might not work that accurate and stable. If one hand is not recognized by the leap motion device, a question mark will appear at the side of the bird.

No guarantees for anything!
